2. Navigate to either Platform or JDT Extension Points Reference
3. Click on one of the extension points
==> not found
The doc.zip does not contain the extension point doc

org.eclipse.ant.core plugin.xml.

Sonia, I will provide a fix, but could you please start using the code from
